component.name: SchildiChat
component.summary: SchildiChat is a Matrix client based on Element with a more traditional instant messaging experience.

description.p: SchildiChat Web/Desktop is a fork of Element Web/Desktop.
The most important changes of SchildiChat compared to Element are:

ul.li: A unifed chat list for both direct and group chats
Bigger items in the room list

description.p: Preliminary Wayland support since 1.7.25. You can flatpak run --socket=wayland --enable-features=UseOzonePlatform,WebRTCPipeWireCapturer --ozone-platform=wayland chat.schildi.desktop to try out running Element natively under Wayland. For GNOME window decorations will be missing and you'll have to use keyboard shortcuts instead to resize the window.
